title: The End of Anniversary

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the beginning of the next day, the host will proclaim that their fate is decided by chance. Then, they will type =role. If the resulting role wouldn't stop the game from ending if it and your target were in a game end state, then your target gets a use of that role's ability. If it would stop the game from ending, your target is dealt a Basic attack. It isn't revealed which happened (unless your target dies, obviously).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the faction that wins the game be decided by chance (if a different faction almost definitely would've won had one of your ability uses flipped differently, then you win).

desc:
Post 4045
*thus who wins the game is determined entirely by the random role that Guy spawns with
